acl.Description: Canned ACL to be applied to the state file

assume_role_policy.Description: The permissions applied when assuming a role.

bucket.Description: The name of the S3 bucket

dynamodb_endpoint.Description: A custom endpoint for the DynamoDB API

dynamodb_table.Description: DynamoDB table for state locking and consistency

encrypt.Description: Whether to enable server side encryption of the state file

endpoint.Description: A custom endpoint for the S3 API

external_id.Description: The external ID to use when assuming the role

force_path_style.Description: Force s3 to use path style api.

iam_endpoint.Description: A custom endpoint for the IAM API

key.Description: The path to the state file inside the bucket

kms_key_id.Description: The ARN of a KMS Key to use for encrypting the state

max_retries.Description: The maximum number of times an AWS API request is retried on retryable failure.

region.Description: The region of the S3 bucket.

session_name.Description: The session name to use when assuming the role.

shared_credentials_file.Description: Path to a shared credentials file

skip_credentials_validation.Description: Skip the credentials validation via STS API.

skip_get_ec2_platforms.Description: Skip getting the supported EC2 platforms.
skip_get_ec2_platforms.Deprecated: The S3 Backend does not require EC2 functionality and this attribute is no longer used.

skip_metadata_api_check.Description: Skip the AWS Metadata API check.

skip_region_validation.Description: Skip static validation of region name.

skip_requesting_account_id.Deprecated: The S3 Backend no longer automatically looks up the AWS Account ID and this attribute is no longer used.

sse_customer_key.Description: The base64-encoded encryption key to use for server-side encryption with customer-provided keys (SSE-C).

sts_endpoint.Description: A custom endpoint for the STS API

workspace_key_prefix.Description: The prefix applied to the non-default state path inside the bucket.
